Title: Reach enhancement of 100% for a DP-64QAM super-channel using MC-DBP
Source: Conf Opt Fiber Commun Tech Dig Ser
Abstract: © 2015 OSA.A digital coherent super-receiver enables the reception and demodulation of a 7×10GBd DP-64QAM Nyquist spaced super-channel. Multi-channel DBP provides a 100% improvement in reach from 640km to 1280km of SSMF, with an ISD of 9.15b/s/Hz.
